00006 // The following defines are necessary due to compiler limitations concerning partial template specialization
00007 #define WCommand4(Class, ReturnType, Arg1, Arg2, Arg3, Arg4) SciCoreNS::WCommand<##Class, ##ReturnType, ##Arg1, ##Arg2, #Arg3, #Arg4>
00008 #define WCommand3(Class, ReturnType, Arg1, Arg2, Arg3) SciCoreNS::WCommand<##Class, ##ReturnType, ##Arg1, ##Arg2, ##Arg3, SciCoreNS::NoArg>
00009 #define WCommand2(Class, ReturnType, Arg1, Arg2) SciCoreNS::WCommand<##Class, ##ReturnType, ##Arg1, ##Arg2, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg>
00010 #define WCommand1(Class, ReturnType, Arg1) SciCoreNS::WCommand<##Class, ##ReturnType, ##Arg1, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg>
00011 #define WCommand0(Class, ReturnType) SciCoreNS::WCommand<##Class, ##ReturnType, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg, SciCoreNS::NoArg>

00017   // WCommand with 4 arguments
00018   template<class _Container, typename _Return, typename _Arg1, typename _Arg2, typename _Arg3, typename _Arg4>
00019   class WCommand
00020   {
00021   public:
00022     typedef _Return (_Container::*Callback)(_Arg1 arg1, _Arg2 arg2, _Arg3 arg3, _Arg4 arg4);
00023 
00024     WCommand(_Container *object, Callback callback, const std::string &syntax = "", const std::string &description = "")
00025     : object_(object), callback_(callback), syntax_(syntax), description_(d){}
00026 
00027     WCommand(const WCommand &src)
00028     : object_(src.object_), callback_(src.callback_), syntax_(src.syntax_), description_(src.description_) {}
00029 
00030     ~WCommand() {}
00031 
00032     _Return operator()(_Arg1 arg1, _Arg2 arg2, _Arg3 arg3, _Arg4 arg4)
00033     {
00034       return (object_->*callback_)(arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4);
00035     }
00036 
00037     void setCallback(Callback cb) {callback_ = cb;}
00038     void setSyntax(const std::string &s) {syntax_ = s;}
00039     std::string syntax() const {return syntax_;}
00040     void setDescription(const std::string &description) {description_ = description;}
00041     std::string description() const {return description_;}
00042 
00043   private:
00044     _Container *object_;
00045     Callback callback_;
00046     std::string syntax_;
00047     std::string description_;
00048   };

00150   template<class _Container, typename _Return>
00151   class WCommand<_Container, _Return, NoArg, NoArg, NoArg, NoArg>
00152   {
00153   public:
00154     typedef _Return (_Container::*Callback)();
00155 
00156     WCommand(_Container *object, Callback callback, const std::string &syntax = "", const std::string &description = "")
00157     : object_(object), callback_(callback), syntax_(syntax), description_(description){}
00158 
00159     WCommand(const WCommand &src)
00160     : object_(src.object_), callback_(src.callback_), syntax_(src.syntax_), description_(src.description_) {}
00161 
00162     ~WCommand() {}
00163 
00164     _Return operator()()
00165     {
00166       return (object_->*callback_)();
00167     }
00168 
00169     void setCallback(Callback cb) {callback_ = cb;}
00170     void setSyntax(const std::string &s) {syntax_ = s;}

00172     void setDescription(const std::string &description) {description_ = description;}
